feed.title: phpBB SiteMaker Blog

entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Welcome to the phpBB SiteMaker documentation site. Previous versions of phpBB SiteMaker shipped with a docs/ directory but it was obvious that no one was using it. Along with this site, a change was made to the upcoming version of phpBB SiteMaker tha...
